sections.heading: board members; contract to teach prohibited
sections.text: No member of a school board shall be engaged in a contract to teach pursuant to sections 79-817 to 79-821 with the school district which he or she serves as a board member.SourceLaws 1881, c. 78, subdivision III, ยง 10, p. 345;Laws 1883, c. 72, ยง 5, p. 291;
